original: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo

sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya
sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ
paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
